description:
Taxable income

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73111 Wage and income tax statistics

Definition:
As per Section 2 (5) of the Income Tax Act:
Taxable income is defined as the income minus tax-free child
allowances (Sections 31, 32 (6)) and compensation for
hardship pursuant to Section 46 (3). Taxable income forms
the basis for the assessment of income tax according to the
tax scale.
